snippet.title: Cranky Food Friends - Android Gameplay HD
snippet.description:
FOR MORE ANDROID GAMES -http://www.youtube.com/user/androidgameplaynet?sub_confirmation=1
Bring everything you've got to the table: Cranky Food Friends has a puzzle for you! Travel the world, collecting food like sundaes, tacos, tea, and curry. Spice up your food, training it to be bigger and better - and follow their stories! Work with friends to build the best restaurants in town, clearing through monster foods standing in the way of your success.
EASY PUZZLE, CHALLENGING RPG
Easy puzzles with lots to master. Swipe up to 5 pieces to remove them and clear the way for the match! The more combos you make, the better your score. Hit enough combos and collect the special piece to get access to a bonus puzzle that will push your combos even higher.
COLLECT HUNDREDS OF FOODS
Collect from cuisines around the world from breakfast to dessert and everything in between. Each food has a unique story that unfolds as you increase your food's power. It's easy to see how your food has evolved -- and checking your friends' leader foods will show you more.
BUILD UP RESTAURANTS
Form a guild with friends to create the best row of restaurants in town. Work with your friends to increase the popularity of each of your restaurants. Watch out for boss foods that want to keep you from the top. You'll need everyone to take them down! It's easy to add friends to your guild so they'll always be there for you.
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Download link - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sega.crankyfoodfriends.android
